articles.author: Holly Ellyatt
articles.title: Germany pushes to boost Covid vaccine uptake after rollout loses steam - CNBC
articles.description: Germany's vaccination drive has been steadily slowing since June, data shows, with the phenomenon seen in other parts of Europe too.
